A C E F G H I M N P R S V 

V

view - package view
 
ViewController - Class in controller
Manages the Memory Manager and Memory Manager Pane operations
ViewController() - Constructor for class controller.ViewController
 
ViewController.HandleClear - Class in controller
Resets the program and all its elements to their default state.
ViewController.HandleCompact - Class in controller
Compacts memory.
ViewController.HandleProcessSelected - Class in controller
Dynamically disables and enables the add/remove buttons and populates the size text field based on whether the currently selected process is in memory
ViewController.HandleRemove - Class in controller
Removes the Process selected in the Process ComboBox from memory
ViewController.HandleResize - Class in controller
Resets the program with the desired size of memory.
ViewController.HandleRun - Class in controller
Adds the process to the memory manager based on the selected algorithm and updates the memory display
